context.custom_context: Journey through fire and ice, masks and truth, self-discovery

verse_1: But every sunrise left me cold.
Whispers of power, shadows of flame,
I wore their masks, but none knew my name.
verse_2: Some stay asleep, some never see,
Some fall in silence, too heavy to be.
But I kept walking, through fire, through frost,
Every mask I shed was a kingdom I lost.
chorus: Through the fire, through the ice,
Through the mirrors, through the lies.
The self is a river, it cuts through the stone,
The truth is eternal — it calls me home.
verse_3: I saw the seekers, blind in their fight,
I saw the dreamers, afraid of the night.
The hidden gospel carved into my skin,
The kingdom I searched for was always within.
verse_4: The shadow is me, the tyrant is me,
The savior I prayed for was buried in me.
False dawns fade, but the night makes it clear,
The one I was seeking was already here.
chorus_repeat: Through the fire, through the ice,
Through the silence, through the cries.
Every mask I burned was a star in the sky,
The self is eternal — it never can die.

mission_alignment.description: Self-stewardship through truth discovery, spiritual journey through fire and ice
